/**
 ******************************************************************************
 * @file           : main.c
 * @author         : Auto-generated by STM32CubeIDE
 * @brief          : Main program body
 ******************************************************************************
 */

#include <stdint.h>
#include "main.h"
#include "Console.h"
#include "DMA.h"



DMA_Init_Typedef MEM_TRF;




int main(void)
{

	MCU_Clock_Setup();
	Delay_Config();
	Console_Init(USART1, 460800);


/*************************************************************************************/
	MEM_TRF.DMA_Port = DMA2;
	MEM_TRF.Stream = DMA2_Stream0;
	MEM_TRF.channel = 0;
	MEM_TRF.circular_buff_enable = 0;
	MEM_TRF.direction = DMA_Direction_Memory_to_Memory;
	MEM_TRF.memory_data_size = Byte;
	MEM_TRF.periphera_data_size = Byte;
	MEM_TRF.priority = 3;
	MEM_TRF.Direct_Mode_Error_interrupt = 0;
	MEM_TRF.FIFO_Overrun_Underrun_interrupt = 0;
	MEM_TRF.Transfer_Complete_interrupt = 1;
	MEM_TRF.Transfer_Error_interrupt = 0;
	MEM_TRF.Half_Transfer_interrupt = 0;
	DMA_Init(&MEM_TRF);
	
/*************************************************************************************/
	uint8_t source = 0x00;
	uint8_t buffer[100];	//Buffer in which the value is to be filled.

/*************************************************************************************/
	MEM_TRF.Desitnation_Address = (uint32_t)&buffer[0];
	MEM_TRF.Source_Address = (uint32_t)&source;
	MEM_TRF.data_length = 100;
	DMA_Trigger(&MEM_TRF);








	for(;;)
	{



	}
}
